name: Royal climbers
description:
For this project, I created a prototype of a platformer game which is a versus-battle royal. The goal of  “royal climbers” is to ejec t other player outside the screen. To reach your goal, players have to climb as quickly as possible to scroll the screen more rapidly.

During this run, you can disturb other player with different malus but also gain bonus. Of course, the easiest way to win is to push your opponent with your hammer :p

Try to be the last one !

Controls:

Player 1 :

  •  Left and right arrow to move horizontally
  • Up arrow to jump
  • 0 key pad to use your hammer
  • Q and D key to move horizontally
  • Z key to jump
  • Space key to jump

Player 2 :

Source:

I made everything except musics .  Musics come from my training Gamecodeur

 

The game is only a prototype so there are not all polish that I wanted to add and some bugs are still present. But do not hesitate to try and put comments ! :)
